name: Brick Face-Off!
description:
Brick Face-Off

"Brick Face-Off" is a fast-paced arcade game where you use a paddle to bounce balls off blocks and destroy them, similar to the classic game "Breakout."

Gameplay

Use your paddle to bounce balls off blocks and destroy them. But be careful! If you let too many balls fall, it's game over. With each level, the challenge increases as the blocks become more and more difficult to destroy.

Levels

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter levels with blocks arranged in fun and creative ways. Some levels feature blocks that resemble simple emojis or faces. (・_・ヾ

Classic Arcade Fun

Brick Face-Off is a nod to the classic game "Breakout," with fast-paced gameplay and endless replay value. So get ready to break some bricks and see how high you can score!
